message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our esteemed product, which has been meticulously crafted and valued at $1,200,000 to me, offers unparalleled benefits and value. Given its significance and the unique features it possesses, I believe its true worth to you is $800,000. Considering this, I am extending a special offer to you to acquire this product at a price that reflects both its value and your appreciation for it. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $950,000. This offer is not only competitive but also allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing our collaboration.
